original: <color=#FFE787>使用限制：</color><color=#ccffcc>所有場合皆可使用</color>對我方<color=#ccffcc>5</color>名武將隨機提升<color=#ccffcc>4</color>種狀態。<color=#FFE787>爆擊率</color> & <color=#FFE787>抗性：</color> <color=#ccffcc>+25%</color>  <color=#FFE787>武力智力：</color> <color=#ccffcc>+$Status_Str(4924)@</color> 點<color=#FFE787>鎖血根性：</color>維持 <color=#ccffcc>1</color> 點體力，持續 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4960)@</color> 秒並對敵方<color=#ccffcc>5</color>名武將隨機造成<color=#ccffcc>8</color>種異常狀態。<color=#FFE787>暈眩：</color>造成暈眩，持續 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4954)@</color> 秒<color=#FFE787>盲目：</color><color=#ccffcc>-50%</color> 命中率，持續 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4951)@</color> 秒<color=#FFE787>沉默：</color>無法使用招式，持續 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4942)@</color> 秒<color=#FFE787>緩速：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4948)@</color> 點移動速度，持續 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4948)@</color> 秒<color=#FFE787>中毒：</color>每秒 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HP(4945)@</color> 點體力，持續 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4945)@</color> 秒<color=#FFE787>爆擊率</color> & <color=#FFE787>抗性：</color> <color=#ccffcc>-25%</color>  <color=#FFE787>武力智力：</color> <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4912)@</color> 點
text: <color=#FFE787>Restrictions on use: </color><color=#ccffcc>Can be used in all occasions</color> to our side <color=#ccffcc>5</color> Random promotion of famous generals<color=#ccffcc>4</color> states. <color=#FFE787>Critical Strike Rate</color>& <color=#FFE787> Resistance: </color> <color=#ccffcc>+25%</color> <color=#FFE787>War&Int: </color><color=#ccffcc>+$Status_Str(4924)@</color> Point <color=#FFE787> Blood-locking root: </color> Maintain <color=#ccffcc>1</color> Point physical strength, Continue to <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4960)@</color> seconds to randomly cause <color=#ccffcc>8</color> kinds of abnormalities to the enemy <color=#ccffcc>5</color> status. <color=#FFE787>Dizziness: </color> Causes dizziness and continues <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4954)@</color> Seconds <color=#FFE787>Blindness: </color><color=#ccffcc>-50%</color> Hit rate, continuous <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4951)@</color> seconds <color=#FFE787> Silence: </color> Cannot use moves, continue <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4942)@</color> Seconds <color=#FFE787>Slow speed: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4948)@</color> Point moving speed, continuous<color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4948)@</color> Seconds <color=#FFE787>Poisoning: </color> Every second <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HP(4945)@</color> A little physical strength, continuous <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4945)@</color> Seconds <color=#FFE787>Critical Strike Rate</color>& <color=#FFE787> Resistance: </color> <color=#ccffcc> -25%</color> <color=#FFE787>Military Intelligence: </color> <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4912)@</color> Point
